\section*{Answer 1(c)}
\bn
\item The MLE calculated using the given data directly and the MLE obtained from the plot of likelihood function vs. p are respectively given as

[1] 0.5261122
\end{Soutput}
\begin{Soutput}
[1] 0.526
\end{Soutput}
\end{Schunk}

\end{figure}
